en_text: 13x ATK and 2x HP when all cards are from Dragonbound & Dragoncaller

jp_skill.name: 継界援龍法
jp_skill.raw_description: 龍喚士・龍契士（コラボを除く）のみでチームを組むと、 HPが2倍、攻撃力は13倍。

kr_skill.name: 경계 원룡법
kr_skill.raw_description: 팀의 서브를 용환사, 용계사(콜라보 제외)만으로 구성하면 HP가 2배, 공격력은 9배

na_skill.name: Draco Summoning Aid
na_skill.raw_description: 2x HP & 9x ATK when all sub-monsters are non-collab Dragonbounds or Dragon Callers
